title: Vidme
description: Vidme's color palette combines vibrant and neutral shades, combining the energy of 'F82A53' with the elegance of '111111'. 'F5F5F5' provides a crisp contrast, while '9F2AF8' adds a creative flair. 'AAAAAA' and 'DFF0D8' bring balance and subtle professionalism. These colors are prominently featured on their brand site, vid.me, and its media pages.
